name: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi
overview: An Institute of National Importance and one of the top engineering institutes in India. Known for its research, innovation, and vibrant campus life in South Delhi.

name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi
overview: The premier medical institute in India, established as an Institute of National Importance. It sets the benchmark for medical education and research in the country.

name: University of Delhi
overview: A premier central university known for its high standards in teaching and research. It has North and South Campuses and affiliates some of the best colleges in India.

name: Jawaharlal Nehru University
overview: A world-renowned central university known for its research in social sciences, international relations, and applied sciences. It is a postgraduate-intensive university.

name: Delhi Technological University
overview: Formerly Delhi College of Engineering (DCE), it is one of the oldest and most prestigious engineering institutions in India, now a state university.

name: Jamia Millia Islamia
overview: A central university with NAAC A++ accreditation. It offers a wide range of courses from school to doctoral level, including engineering, law, and mass communication.

name: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University
overview: A state university established by the Govt of NCT of Delhi. It affiliates numerous professional colleges in Delhi-NCR.

name: National Law University, Delhi
overview: One of the most prestigious law schools in India, consistently ranked 2nd in NIRF Law rankings. It conducts its own entrance exam, AILET.

name: Maulana Azad Medical College
location: Bahadur Shah Zafar Marg, New Delhi, Delhi
overview: A premier government medical college affiliated to University of Delhi. Attached to Lok Nayak Hospital, G.B. Pant Hospital, and Guru Nanak Eye Centre.

name: Lady Hardinge Medical College
overview: A historic medical college for women (PG is co-ed), associated with Sucheta Kriplani Hospital and Kalawati Saran Children's Hospital.

name: Vardhman Mahavir Medical College & Safdarjung Hospital
overview: Attached to the famous Safdarjung Hospital, it is one of the most prominent medical colleges in India, affiliated with GGSIPU.

name: Netaji Subhas University of Technology
overview: Formerly NSIT (Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology) under DU, it is now a state university. It is a top-tier engineering institute known for its placements.

name: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology Delhi
overview: A state university created by an act of Delhi Govt. It is a research-led institute known for its CS and AI programs.

courses.name: B.Tech (CSAI, CSE, ECE, CSD, CSSS, CSB)

name: Shri Ram College of Commerce
overview: The most prestigious college for Commerce and Economics in India, affiliated with the University of Delhi.

name: St. Stephen's College
overview: One of the oldest and most distinguished colleges in India, known for its liberal arts and science programs. Affiliated with DU.

name: Miranda House
overview: Consistently ranked #1 in NIRF College rankings. A premier women's college affiliated with the University of Delhi.

name: Hindu College
overview: One of the most highly regarded science and arts colleges in India, affiliated with DU. Known for its vibrant political and cultural life.

name: Indira Gandhi Delhi Technical University for Women
overview: A specialized technical university for women, formerly IGIT. It is known for excellent placements in tech companies.

name: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar University Delhi
overview: A state university established by the Govt of NCT of Delhi, focusing on humanities and social sciences. It has campuses in Kashmere Gate, Karampura, and Lodhi Road.

name: School of Planning and Architecture, New Delhi
overview: An Institute of National Importance specialized in education and research in planning and architecture.

name: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi
location: New Delhi, New Delhi District, Delhi
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute
